content:
There are several ways to find affordable pet-friendly accommodations in a major city like New York:

1. Check pet-friendly hotel chains: Many hotel chains like Motel 6, Red Roof Inn and La Quinta offer pet-friendly accommodations at affordable prices.

2. Check Airbnb listings: Airbnb is a great option for finding pet-friendly accommodations as many hosts allow pets in their homes. You can filter your search results to only show pet-friendly listings.

3. Search for apartments that allow pets: There are many apartment buildings in New York City that allow pets. Websites like Zillow and Apartments.com have filters that allow you to search for pet-friendly apartments.

4. Utilize pet-friendly travel websites: Websites like BringFido and Petswelcome can help you find pet-friendly hotels, vacation rentals and restaurants in New York City.

5. Ask for recommendations: You can ask pet owners in New York City for recommendations on affordable pet-friendly accommodations. You can also check with local pet stores, groomers, and veterinarians for recommendations.
